This means the server that hosts your file does not allow requests from other sites (cross-origin requests, or CORS). You need to move the asset to a server that allows cross-origin file downloads. Learn more about CORS at https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/CORS. If your file is on GitHub, load it from "raw.githubusercontent.com". Here's how to do that: 1. Remove the "/blob/" part of the URL.
